attributes.action: Pay off  everyones Mortgage  in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Would it not be cheaper to pay off everyones mortgage in the UK rather than throw billions to banks who then waste it.

This would then give people more money to spend so that high street stores like Woolworths etc do not go bust.Banks would then have money to lend to businesses and people, and those
who wish to buy their first home.

£80 million pounds is cheaper than 30 billion pounds. which is the money being thrown at some banks!!!!!!!!! and it seems there's more money going to be thrown their way as well.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
